member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.AppServiceAuthenticationHandler
member.summary: A HttpMessageHandler that attaches the authentication information for the currently logged in user to the request.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.AppServiceClient
member.summary: The main starting point for interacting with an Azure AppService based application. Provides user authentication functionality and access to Api App and Mobile App client objects.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient
member.summary: Represents the main starting point for interacting with an Azure AppService based application. Provides user authentication functionality and access to Api App and Mobile App client objects.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient.CreateHandler(System.Net.Http.DelegatingHandler[])
member.summary: Creates a DelegatingHandler wired into a pipeline that consists of the specified handlers and all existing handlers registered with the IAppServiceClient instance.
member.param: DelegatingHandler instances to be wired into the pipeline.
member.returns: The outer DelegatingHandler of the resulting HttpMessageHandler pipeline.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient.CreateApiAppClient(System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates an instance of HttpClient ready for communication with the Api App located at the given address.
member.param: The Uri for the Api App
member.returns: An HttpClient instance with the base address set to the Uri for the ApiApp

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient.CreateApiAppClient(System.Uri,System.Net.Http.DelegatingHandler[])
member.summary: Creates an instance of HttpClient ready for communication with the Api App located at the given address.
member.param: The Uri for the Api App
A set of DelegatingHandler instances that should be wired into the http pipeline of the HttpClient.
member.returns: An HttpClient instance with the base address set to the Uri for the ApiApp and the specified handlers wired in to its pipeline.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient.LoginAsync(System.String,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Logs a user in using a token acquired from the specified provider.
member.param: The Authentication provider the token is associated with.
Provider specific object with existing OAuth token to log in with.
member.returns: Task that will complete when the user has finished authentication.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient.Logout
member.summary: Logs the user out.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient.SetCurrentUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the currently authenticated user using the specified id and authentication token.
member.remarks: This is useful in scenarios where the authentication token has been cached on the device to avoid repeated logins.
member.param: The userId to set.
The authentication token to set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient.GetConsentLinkAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Obtain a login URI for the specified Api App.
member.param: The name of the Api App to obtain the login URI for
The redirect URL that should be embedded in the returned Login URI
member.returns: The LoginURI for the specified Api App.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient.GetAllConsentLinksAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get all available consent links required for installed Api Apps.
member.param: Redirect url to be used when logging in to any of these links.
member.returns: Dictionary of api app name -> redirect url

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient.CurrentUser
member.summary: The current authenticated user provided after a successful call to IAppServiceClient.Login().

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceUser
member.summary: Represents a user that has been successfully authenticated by the AppService gateway.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceUser.UserId
member.summary: An id value that can be used to uniquely identify a given user within the scope of a particular AppService gateway.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceUser.AuthenticationToken
member.summary: The authentication token sent on all requests to identify the user.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.AppServiceMobileClientExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for obtaining instances of IMobileServiceClient from a given IAppServiceClient.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.AppServiceMobileClientExtensions.CreateMobileServiceClient(Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new IMobileServiceClient instance configured with the specified URI for the Mobile App.
member.param: The IAppServiceClient.
The URI of the Mobile App.

member.summary: Creates a new IMobileServiceClient instance configured with the specified URI for the Mobile App.
member.param: The IAppServiceClient.
The URI of the Mobile App.
The delegating handlers to wire into the HTTP pipeline of the returned IMobileServiceClient
